text: Paul Seban (21 October 1929 – 1 July 2020) was an Algerian-born French movie director and journalist. He was born in Sidi Bel Abbès, French Algeria. He wrote articles for Positif and Ligue de l'enseignement. He was known for directing La Musica and French Cancan. Seban died on 1 July 2020 in Paris, aged 90. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Algerian journalists Category:Algerian entertainers Category:French journalists Category:French movie directors
title: Paul Seban
